FinancialDeal.name: FinancialDeal
FinancialDeal.description: Represents the deal that the financial institution is working on.

AccountId.description: The account ID of the customer who engaged the financial institution in this deal.

CloseProbability.description: The probability of the deal being successfully closed.

ConfidentialityType.description: Specifies the level of confidentiality of the information that's recorded in the financial deal.

ConflictStatus.description: Specifies the status of the conflict clearance for the financial deal.

ExpectedCloseDate.description: The date when the deal is expected to close.

FinancialDealCode.description: A unique code that identifies the deal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MandatedDate.description: The date when the financial deal was mandated.

Name.description: The name of the financial deal.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

ReceivedFee.description: The total fee received by the financial institution until the current date.

Role.description: The role that the financial institution plays in this deal.

Stage.description: Specifies the stage of the deal.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the deal.

TotalExpectedFee.description: The total fee expected by the financial institution until the current date.

TotalExpense.description: The total expense incurred for the financial deal until the current date.

TransactionValue.description: The total transaction value of the financial deal.
